original_title: President and ruling party MPs to meet on Monday (12)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A special meeting will be held between President Ranil Wickremesinghe and the MPs of the ruling party on Monday (12).

A senior State Minister says that the meeting will be held on Monday (12) at 05.30 pm at the President's Office. The meeting will focus on the current economic and political situation of Sri Lanka. They will also discuss the issues faced by ruling party MPs in their work.
The State Minister told News 1st that another objective of the discussion is to solve the issues of the country while protecting the 113-seat majority as well.
